item.title: Mutiple_gits
item.description: It’s quiet easy if we only have one git account, and it became confused when we want to add more account. I also met this problem. But I have find solutions so let me show how to handle it. You should know the difference between git and github. github is one kind of git, and git have many website name such as gitlab, gitee… So there should have 2 circumstances. however you can consider it as one condition: same email or not.
